description.p: Returns the largest integer that is less than or equal to Number.
Returns the largest integer that is less than or equal to the specified numeric value.

discussion.p: The Floor function the largest integer that is less than or equal to the specified numeric value.

example.caption: Floor() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Floor(-1.2) AS EXPR1, Floor(11.7) AS EXPR2 FROM Products = -2|11
